trans-unit.source: Provides methods that help you use X.509 v.3 certificates.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona métodos para ayudarle a utilizar certificados X.509 v.3.

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 DER es el único formato de certificado compatible con esta clase.

trans-unit.source: For most scenarios, you should use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> class instead.
trans-unit.target: Para la mayoría de los escenarios, debe usar la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> clase en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: A partir de la [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], este tipo implementa la <xref:System.IDisposable> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Cuando haya terminado de utilizar el tipo, debe eliminar del mismo directa o indirectamente.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Para deshacerse del tipo directamente, llame a su <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> método en un `try` / `catch` bloque.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Para deshacerse de él indirectamente, use una construcción de lenguaje como `using` (en C#) o `Using` (en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea la sección "Uso de un objeto que implementa IDisposable" en el <xref:System.IDisposable> tema de la interfaz.

trans-unit.source: For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> class does not implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method.
trans-unit.target: Para las aplicaciones que tienen como destino el [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] y versiones anteriores, el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> clase no implementa la <xref:System.IDisposable> de interfaz y, por tanto, no tiene un `Dispose` método.

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an X.509 certificate from a file, calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.ToString%2A> method, and displays the results to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se carga un certificado X.509 de un archivo, llamadas el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.ToString%2A> método y muestra los resultados en la consola.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> class.

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 DER es el único formato de certificado compatible con esta clase.

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que contiene los datos de un certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> class defined from a sequence of bytes representing an X.509v3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> definida a partir de una secuencia de bytes que representa un certificado X.509v3.

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 DER es el único formato de certificado compatible con esta clase.

trans-unit.source: If you create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `data`, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.
trans-unit.target: Si crea un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> certificado mediante la especificación de un almacén de archivo firmado PKCS7 para `data`, el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> se crea para el certificado que firmó el almacén en lugar de cualquiera de los certificados en el almacén.

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an X.509 certificate file into an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object, exports the certificate as a byte array, and then imports the byte array into another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se carga un archivo de certificado X.509 en un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> objeto, exporte el certificado como una matriz de bytes y, a continuación, importa la matriz de bytes en otro <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor crea un nuevo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> objeto usando un identificador para el contexto de certificado de la API criptográfica de Microsoft, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a copy of the certificate context.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor crea una copia del contexto del certificado.

trans-unit.source: Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released.
trans-unit.target: No se da por supuesto que la estructura de contexto que pasó al constructor es válida; que se han liberado.

trans-unit.source: You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Handle%2A> property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object.
trans-unit.target: Puede obtener una copia del elemento actual `PCCERT_CONTEXT` de la estructura de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Handle%2A> propiedad, pero solo es válido durante la duración de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> implementa el <xref:System.IDisposable> interfaz a partir de la [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; en versiones anteriores de .NET Framework, el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> clase no implementa esta interfaz y por lo tanto, la `Dispose` método no existe.

trans-unit.source: Exports the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Exporta el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> actual a una matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> values that describes how to format the output data.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> que describe cómo dar formato a los datos de salida.

trans-unit.source: Exports the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object to a byte array in a format described by one of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Exporta el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> actual a una matriz de bytes en un formato descrito por uno de los valores de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que representa el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The `contentType` parameter accepts only the following values of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> enumeration: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12>.
trans-unit.target: El `contentType` parámetro acepta solo los valores siguientes de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> enumeración: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>, y <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12>.

trans-unit.source: Passing any other value causes a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Pasar cualquier otro valor causas un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> que se produzca.

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an X.509 certificate file into an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object, exports the certificate as a byte array, and then imports the byte array into another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se carga un archivo de certificado X.509 en un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> objeto, exporte el certificado como una matriz de bytes y, a continuación, importa la matriz de bytes en otro <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A value other than <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert" />, or <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12" /> was passed to the <paramref name="contentType" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se ha pasado al parámetro <paramref name="contentType" /> un valor distinto de <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert" /> o <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs12" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The certificate could not be exported.
trans-unit.target: No se puede exportar el certificado.

trans-unit.source: for permission to open a key container and export a certificate when you pass the <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert" /> value to the <paramref name="contentType" /> parameter.

trans-unit.source: The date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: Fecha y hora que se van a convertir.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified date and time to a string.
trans-unit.target: Convierte la fecha y la hora especificadas en una cadena.

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the value of the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Representación de cadena del valor del objeto <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.

trans-unit.source: Some cultures cannot convert future dates into strings.
trans-unit.target: Algunas referencias culturales no pueden convertir fechas futuras en cadenas.

trans-unit.source: If the expiration date of an X.509 certificate is beyond the range of the culture, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.FormatDate%2A> falls back to a calendar that can express the date.
trans-unit.target: Si la fecha de expiración de un certificado X.509 es más allá del intervalo de la referencia cultural, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.FormatDate%2A> vuelve a un calendario que puede expresar la fecha.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> value is <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>, the calendar is changed to the <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> class; otherwise, it is changed to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> valor es <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>, el calendario se cambia a la <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> clase; en caso contrario, se cambia a la <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash value for the X.509v3 certificate as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el valor hash del certificado X.509v3 en forma de matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: The hash value for the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Valor hash del certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> method to fill an array of bytes with the hash value for an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se usa el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> método para rellenar una matriz de bytes con el valor hash de un certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Returns the SHA1 hash value for the X.509v3 certificate as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el valor hash SHA1 del certificado X.509v3 en forma de cadena hexadecimal.

trans-unit.source: The hexadecimal string representation of the X.509 certificate hash value.
trans-unit.target: Cadena hexadecimal que representa el valor hash del certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHashString%2A> method to get an X.509 certificate hash value, convert it to a string, and display it to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se utiliza el <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHashString%2A> para obtener un valor hash del certificado X.509, convertir en una cadena y mostrarlo en la consola.

trans-unit.source: Returns the effective date of this X.509v3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la fecha efectiva de este certificado X.509v3.

trans-unit.source: The effective date for this X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Fecha efectiva de este certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: The effective date is the date after which the X.509 certificate is considered valid.
trans-unit.target: La fecha efectiva es la fecha tras el cual el certificado X.509 se considera válido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetEffectiveDateString%2A> method returns a string that shows the date formatted in Short Date Pattern followed by the time formatted in Long Time Pattern.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetEffectiveDateString%2A> método devuelve una cadena que muestra la fecha con formato en el patrón de fecha corta seguida de la hora con formato de hora larga.

trans-unit.source: The date and time are formatted using the current culture and time zone.

trans-unit.source: Populates the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object using data from a byte array, a password, and flags for determining how the private key is imported.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to populate an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> object using a password for the certificate represented by the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Este método se puede utilizar para rellenar un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate> utilizando una contraseña para el certificado representado por la matriz de bytes del objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control where and how the private key is imported.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> valor puede usarse para controlar dónde y cómo se importa la clave privada.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="rawData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="rawData" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The length of the <paramref name="rawData" /> parameter is 0.
trans-unit.target: La longitud del parámetro <paramref name="rawData" /> es 0.

trans-unit.source: Populates an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object with information from a certificate file, a password, and a key storage flag.
trans-unit.target: Rellena un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> con información de un archivo de certificado, una contraseña y una marca de almacenamiento de claves.

trans-unit.source: Never hard code a password within your source code.
trans-unit.target: Nunca codificar una contraseña en el código fuente.

trans-unit.source: Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.
trans-unit.target: Contraseñas codificadas de forma rígida se pueden recuperar desde un ensamblado con el [Ildasm.exe (Desensamblador de IL)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), un editor hexadecimal, o sencillamente abriendo el ensamblado en un editor de texto como Notepad.exe.
